title: How Did It Go?
itunes:title: How Did It Go?
description:
A day after Liz Truss's big conference speech, we get reaction from Paymaster General Edward Argar and analysis from Bloomberg Opinion's Therese Raphael. She tells hosts Yuan Potts and Stephen Carroll it was the Prime Minister's best performance yet, but that's an "exceptionally low bar". Plus: could a freeze in tax allowances by the government mean millions paying more tax, rather than less? Bloomberg's Senior Economics reporter Philip Aldrick and Senior UK Economist Dan Hanson discuss. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
